title: 2015 Stanton Holly Trail
desc: The 2015 Saturday Tour is on December 5, 2015 .?  The tour starts at Round Valley Reservoir with?buses departing every half hour starting at 8:15 and running till 10:15.? Online time slots are offered between 8:45 and 10:15.? The bus will go directly to the church where you have the option to enjoy the Red Tour or the Green Tour, or visit the Craft Boutique in the basement of the church.? We have 5 decorated houses, a Candy house and a complimentary Silver Tea house.? We also have a luncheon at the Stanton Reformed Church, available by reservation, at the time of ticket purchase.? The lunch for 2015 is Roasted Tomato Soup, White Truffle Mac & Cheese, Butternut Squash & Kale Salad with Pumpkin Seeds & Lemon Vinaigrette, Tiramisu Parfait, Tea or Coffee.? Please make sure you provide a valid mailing address to send tickets to.? You cannot download tickets for the event.
